Your job market paper is almost finished, you have other work finished or maybe even published, and you're ready to go out there on your own! This is a super-exciting time, but it can also be intimidating and scary. 

<img src="https://media.giphy.com/media/H22R4SWhjfEQCnueDI/giphy.gif#center" alt="independence">

This is our **4th year workshop**. As the name suggests, the material is intended for students that are preparing for the job market.
